headline: References In Address To 2013 Deal Had Holes
abstract: In his address from the White House, the president was misleading in describing the nuclear deal negotiated by the Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: President Trump, responding during a White House address on Wednesday to the missile strikes by Iran, assailed the nuclear agreement reached by his predecessor and praised American military might. The 10-minute address contained numerous inaccuracies and claims that lacked evidence. Hereâ€™s a fact check.
